text: Allaha ye sasya o gabadi pasu srsti karechena se sabera madhya theke tara allahara jan'ya eka ansa nirdista kare ebam nijedera dharana anuyayi bale, â€˜eta allahara jan'ya ebam eta amadera sarikadera [1] jan'yaâ€™. Atahpara ya tadera sarikadera ansa ta allahara kache paumchaya na ebam ya allahara ansa ta tadera sarikadera kache pauchaya, tara ya phayasala kare ta kata'i na nikrsta
